name: protocol
title: Protocol
description: A method used during an action.
examples: `a pitfall trap method for sampling ground-dwelling arthropods`; `a point-radius georeferencing method`; `a linear regression model to estimate body mass from skeletal measurements`; `a Bayesian phylogenetic inference method`
rdfs:comment: A method used during an action.

fields.name: protocolID
fields.title: Protocol ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: protocolType
fields.title: Protocol Type
fields.description: A category that best matches the nature of a dwc:Protocol.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: protocolName
fields.title: Protocol Name
fields.comments: `ad hoc observation`; `bottom trawl`; `point count`; `UV light trap`
fields.rdfs:comment: A name given to the resource.

fields.name: protocolDescription
fields.title: Protocol Description
fields.description: A detailed description of a dwc:Protocol.

fields.name: protocolReferences
fields.title: Protocol References
fields.description: A list (concatenated and separated) of dcterms:BibliographicResources used in a dwc:Protocol.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to separate multiple values in a list with space vertical bar space (` | `).
fields.examples: `Penguins from space: faecal stains reveal the location of emperor penguin colonies, https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1466-8238.2009.00467.x`
fields.rdfs:comment: The references to the methods used during the dwc:Event.

fields.name: protocolRemarks
fields.title: Protocol Remarks
fields.description: Comments or notes about a dwc:Protocol.
